about.title: About This Project
about.description1: This project combines my hands-on CNC experience with software development skills acquired during my studies. It represents a practical solution to real-world manufacturing challenges.
about.description2: By automating repetitive tasks and improving tool management, this system contributes to more efficient and sustainable industrial processes.
